Reviews.Content: Worst Hotel I've ever stayed in!!! We went with the Contiki tour with 51 people... not one person had a positive thing to say about this hotel. The staff was rude, the bathrooms had mold in them and there were a couple of incidents with spider bites and flying insects in the rooms. Also, the rooms contain little to no hot water. The hotel claims to have a 4 star rating, but that couldn't be further from the truth... if you're staying in this neighborhood... do what we did and check out and walk half a block south the the Cosmopolitian Hotel... it's beautiful and about the same price 99 Euro a night. I wished I never set foot in this hotel!!
Reviews.Author: nevada17
